title: Social Domain Practical Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Balanced Design for Learning (BDP)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Participatory workshops conducted in classroom settings where digital devices (laptops/tablets) are available.

learning_goals: Learners can create social sector project proposals balancing learning outcomes and workload considerations using the BDP tool
Learners can derive at least three improvement points for educational programs by interpreting learning analytics data
Learners can develop and validate practical applicability of assessment rubrics based on the BDP framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
